name: Aluminium Warrior Z
description:
Game developed in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2017 (GGJ17: http://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/aluminium-warrior-z). Theme: "Waves".

Made with Unity.

Description

Do experience the epic adventure of our tin-foil-hat hero as he tries to avoid and overcome all malicious electromagnetic waves radiated from hundreds of evil electronic devices surrounding him!

Protected only by his aluminium foil hat and armored with the Legendary Bat of Wisdom, he will defeat his enemies in order to protect all humanity from the deadly waves that plague our world...

Personal contribution

Under construction.
